title: Foxfire Ahri
body: In my opinion having all of the orbs blue kind of kills the skin. If you made the skin have red abilities it would be AMAZING!!!!!!

replies.body: I know it can be a bummer when stuff like this happens, but I'm sure you could find someone who thought the same thing and made a custom skin?

They can't.  Due to the fact that in blind pick they need to be able to tell them apart, it's like the new Syndra skin 
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BK5KqbAfyC0/VUG1MkmV0wI/AAAAAAAApIY/Cf6dM9EOm4Y/s1600/syndra.jpg

for the sake of clarity they can't due to the fact the enemies attacks are tinted red already.

Plus for Ahri they can't do alot with it because of her passive, they need the colors to work well so people can tell when it's up.
Yup, this is correct! Due to gameplay clarity, the colors of most of her skills need to remain consistent. We can change the hue, just not the color (see Popstar Ahri).
They just ruined the whole point of foxfire ahri i would rather pay 1350 because of particale changes for a clashing 975
